== What's this? ==

We'd like to get Kubuntu translations in shape for Karmic and we're organising a whole day event for this purpose. Here are the details:

* '''WHAT''': Kubuntu Translations Day
* '''WHERE''': <nowiki>[[http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=kubuntu-devel|#kubuntu-devel]]</nowiki> IRC channel on Freenode
* '''WHEN''': Wednesday, the 29th of July 2009

== How can I participate? ==

You simply need to join us on #kubuntu-devel and be willing to make Kubuntu translations rock!

Here are some suggestions for activities you can do. Feel free to add anything else you can think of related to Kubuntu translations.

If you are a:
* '''Translator'''
** Help getting <nowiki>[[Translations-Upstream-KDE-KdeKarmicModules|translation templates]]</nowiki> in shape
** Locate untranslated or untranslatable Kubuntu applications and <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/|report bugs against the Ubuntu Translations]]</nowiki> project
** <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/|Report]]</nowiki> and fix Kubuntu i18n/l10n bugs
** <nowiki>[[Translations-Upstream-KDE|Submit fixes and translations upstream]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/karmic/+translations|Translate]]</nowiki>!
* '''User'''
** Locate untranslated Kubuntu applications and report it either at #kubuntu-devel or at the <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/|Ubuntu Translations]]</nowiki> project
** Have you ever thought of joining a K/Ubuntu <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/+groups/ubuntu-translators/|translation team]]</nowiki>?. Now is your chance ;) !
* '''Developer'''
** <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/|Report]]</nowiki> and fix Kubuntu i18n/l10n bugs
** Help documenting the <nowiki>[[Translations-Upstream-KDE-KubuntuTranslationsLifecycle|Kubuntu translations lifecycle]]</nowiki>
** Help users and translators with their questions
** Who said that developers couldn't translate? Have you ever considered joining a K/Ubuntu <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/+groups/ubuntu-translators/|translation team]]</nowiki>?
